articles.title: Our voice is being heard: Thurston backs All Stars anthem stance - NRL.COM
articles.description: Former Test and Origin great Johnathan Thurston has praised the ARL Commission for listening to the concerns of Indigenous players and scrapping Advance Australia Fair before the annual All Stars match.
